it.polimi.se2018.server.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.server.controller.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Class GameController: the class represents the controller of the MVC pattern used for this project, the class implements the interface Observer because receives the notify from the view, from which the controller updates its state and knows how to modify the model to obey to the user input. The class is responsible of the creation of the new game and of the settings of the observer/observable and the model of the different virtual view connected to the game. The class is used to managing the application logic and the state of the game
    Author:
    fadda-miceli-mundo
    See Also:
    Observer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private int calculatePlayerTurn(int turn, int numberOfPlayers)
      method that calculate the id of the player that has to play in the specified turn using the number of players that are playing the game
      private void checkCost(VirtualView view, int indexTool)
      method use only in multi-player mode that checks if the tokens of the player are enough to use the selected tool card
      private void checkDice(VirtualView view, int indexTool, int indexPool)
      method used only in single-player mode that checks if the dice selected by the player is of the same color of the selected tool card using model
      private void createGame(java.util.List<VirtualView> viewList, boolean singlePlayer, Model model)
      method responsible for the creation of every aspects of the Game and the game controller, the method load from a file json the useful settings (timer of the turn), and create the list of the virtual view in the game composed by the different virtual view connected to the game, independently by the technology used to connect to the server.
      private void endMatch(boolean finish)
      method that send to the model that the game was finish
      private void endRound()
      method that increase the round by one and calls the endMatch method if the game finish else calls the startTurn method setting the turn to zero
      private void endTimer()
      method that stop the timer if there's one currently running
      private int getCurrID()
      method that provides the caller the identifier number of the player that is playing in the current turn
      protected Model getModel()
      method that provides the caller the model linked of this controller through which can access to the model's components and methods
      (package private) int getSinglePlayerDifficulty()
      method that provides the caller the difficulty of single-player mode chosen by the player, the difficulty goes from 1 to 5 indicates the number of tool card given at the start of the game
      (package private) int getStep()
      method that provides the caller the current step of the player's turn: 0 using dice, 1 using tool card
      (package private) int getTurn()
      method that provides the caller current turn number from 0 to number of player multiplied by 2
      (package private) java.util.List<VirtualView> getViewGame()
      method that provides the caller the list of virtual views linked to the controller
      private void handlingDisconnection(int id, VirtualView virtualView)
      method that manage the disconnection of the client on the basis of the current game moment, handle also the case of the player doesn't set name or doesn't chose pattern card or both
      private void handlingReconnection(VirtualView view)
      method that manage the reconnection of the client linking the new virtual view with that one previously disconnected
      protected boolean isSinglePlayer()
      method that provides the caller true if the mode of the game is single-player
      private void nextStepMove(VirtualView view)
      method that manage the next step of turn after a move
      (package private) void nextStepTool(VirtualView view)
      method that manage the next step of turn after a tool card step
      (package private) void nextTurn()
      method that increase the turn by one and calls the startTurn method if multi-player mode, else singlePlayerTurn method
      private void sendExitNotification(int iD)
      method that send to the model the id of the player that has decided to exit from the game
      private void sendReconnectNotification(int iD)
      method that send to the model the id of the player that has decided to reconnect to the game after to be exited
      private void setCustomPatternModel(VirtualView view, PatternCard patternCard)
      method that checks if custom pattern card inserted by player is valid, in affirmative case send that to the model if all player chose pattern card it starts the first round
      private void setDraftPoolModel(VirtualView view)
      method that send to the model that the draft pool has to be rolled
      private void setEndRoundModel()
      method that send to the model that the round ended
      private void setFinalPointsModel(java.util.List<Player> playerList, boolean finish)
      method that send to the model the final points of each player through a list of player and signals through a boolean if the current points correspond to the end game rank or an interruption before the game has started
      private void setMoveModel(VirtualView view, int indexPool, int indexPattern)
      method that send to the model that the player has played his move where the index pool corresponds to the index in the draft pool of the dice chosen by player and the index pattern corresponds to the index of the pattern card where the dice has to be inserted, if model notifies the controller of an InvalidMoveException, the method restarts the step else goes to the next step
      private void setPatternCardModel(VirtualView view, int indexPatternChoose)
      method that send to the model the pattern card chose by the player, if all player chose pattern card it starts the first round
      private void setPlayerDisconnection(int playerID)
      method that send to the model that the player, having the indicated ID, disconnected from the game and increase the number of disconnected players by one.
      private void setPlayerNameModel(VirtualView view, java.lang.String name)
      method that checks if the name set by player is valid, in affirmative case send the name to the model otherwise it signals the error, if all players set name it starts the pattern card chose
      private void setPlayerReconnect(int playerID)
      method that send to the model that the player, having the indicated ID, reconnected from the game and decrease the number of disconnected players by one
      private void setSinglePlayerDifficulty(int difficulty)
      method that allowed the caller to set the single-player mode difficulty, the difficulty goes from 1 to 5 and indicates the number of tool card given at the start of the game
      private void setTokensModel(VirtualView view)
      method that send to the model the current tokens of the player
      private void setToolSinglePlayer()
      method that send the request of the difficulty of the game from single-player virtual view
      private void singlePlayerTurn()
      method starts the turn of single-player mode, if turn is the last plus one calls the endRound method
      private void startCard()
      method that send to the model the cards of the game from each virtual view
      private void startChoose(VirtualView view)
      method that send the chose, of to use tool card or to do a move, to the player
      private void startGame()
      method that send the started game event from each virtual view
      private void startMove(VirtualView view)
      method that starts the move step
      protected void startTimer()
      method responsible of starting the timer of the player's turn and let the player TIMERTURN seconds to do the move, after that switch to the next turn ignoring the current player
      (package private) void startTool(VirtualView view)
      method that starts the tool card step
      private void startTurn()
      method starts the turn of multi-player mode, if turn is the last plus one calls the endRound method else calls the startChose method on virtual view of the player that has to play
      private void stepController(VirtualView view, int step)
      method that manage the step on the turn using nextStepTool method and nextStepMove method

        Class constructor for the game controller with a list of virtual view to link to the game and the game mode
        Parameters:
        viewList - list of virtual view connected to the game
        singlePlayer - true if the game mode is single-player, else multi-player

        singlePlayer - true if the game mode is single-player, else multi-player
        model - the model

    • Method Detail

      • createGame

        private void createGame(java.util.List<VirtualView> viewList,
                        boolean singlePlayer,
                        Model model)
        method responsible for the creation of every aspects of the Game and the game controller, the method load from a file json the useful settings (timer of the turn), and create the list of the virtual view in the game composed by the different virtual view connected to the game, independently by the technology used to connect to the server. The method also set the model for the current controller instance, set the observer and the model of the virtual view and at the start a new game
        Parameters:
        viewList - of virtual view connected
        singlePlayer - game mode
        model - model associated with the controller

      • getViewGame

        java.util.List<VirtualView> getViewGame()
        method that provides the caller the list of virtual views linked to the controller
        Returns:
        a list of virtual views

        int getTurn()
        method that provides the caller current turn number from 0 to number of player multiplied by 2
        Returns:
        current turn number

      • getStep

        int getStep()
        method that provides the caller the current step of the player's turn: 0 using dice, 1 using tool card
        Returns:
        number identifier of current step of the turn

      • getSinglePlayerDifficulty

        int getSinglePlayerDifficulty()
        method that provides the caller the difficulty of single-player mode chosen by the player, the difficulty goes from 1 to 5 indicates the number of tool card given at the start of the game
        Returns:
        difficulty number

      • setSinglePlayerDifficulty

        private void setSinglePlayerDifficulty(int difficulty)
        method that allowed the caller to set the single-player mode difficulty, the difficulty goes from 1 to 5 and indicates the number of tool card given at the start of the game
        Parameters:
        difficulty - difficulty number

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Override of the method update of the interface Observer. The methods is the responsible of receiving all the the notification from the virtual view (representation of the view in the server), as observer of the view. Depending on the runtime events received from the view,the controller updates its state and then changes the model using the methods that manipulate the application logic
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        o - the observable virtual view
        arg - the object received

      • setPlayerNameModel

        private void setPlayerNameModel(VirtualView view,
                                java.lang.String name)
        method that checks if the name set by player is valid, in affirmative case send the name to the model otherwise it signals the error, if all players set name it starts the pattern card chose
        Parameters:
        view - the virtual view corresponding to the client that has inserted name
        name - the name chosen

      • setCustomPatternModel

        private void setCustomPatternModel(VirtualView view,
                                   PatternCard patternCard)
        method that checks if custom pattern card inserted by player is valid, in affirmative case send that to the model if all player chose pattern card it starts the first round
        Parameters:
        view - the virtual view corresponding to the client that has inserted the custom pattern
        patternCard - the custom pattern inserted

      • setPatternCardModel

        private void setPatternCardModel(VirtualView view,
                                 int indexPatternChoose)
        method that send to the model the pattern card chose by the player, if all player chose pattern card it starts the first round
        Parameters:
        view - the virtual view corresponding to the client that has chosen the pattern
        indexPatternChoose - the index in the list of pattern cards delivered to the player

      • setTokensModel

        private void setTokensModel(VirtualView view)
        method that send to the model the current tokens of the player
        Parameters:
        view - the virtual view corresponding to the client whose tokens has to be modified

      • setDraftPoolModel

        private void setDraftPoolModel(VirtualView view)
        method that send to the model that the draft pool has to be rolled
        Parameters:
        view - the virtual view corresponding to the client that rolls draft pool

      • setMoveModel

        private void setMoveModel(VirtualView view,
                          int indexPool,
                          int indexPattern)
        method that send to the model that the player has played his move where the index pool corresponds to the index in the draft pool of the dice chosen by player and the index pattern corresponds to the index of the pattern card where the dice has to be inserted, if model notifies the controller of an InvalidMoveException, the method restarts the step else goes to the next step
        Parameters:
        view - the virtual view corresponding to the client
        indexPattern - the index in the draft pool of the dice chosen by player
        indexPool - the index pattern corresponds to the index of the pattern card where the dice has to be inserted

      • setEndRoundModel

        private void setEndRoundModel()
        method that send to the model that the round ended

      • setFinalPointsModel

        private void setFinalPointsModel(java.util.List<Player> playerList,
                                 boolean finish)
        method that send to the model the final points of each player through a list of player and signals through a boolean if the current points correspond to the end game rank or an interruption before the game has started
        Parameters:
        playerList - list that contains players sorted in descending order by points
        finish - false if the game endx for an interruption before the game has started

      • setPlayerDisconnection

        private void setPlayerDisconnection(int playerID)
        method that send to the model that the player, having the indicated ID, disconnected from the game and increase the number of disconnected players by one. If the number of player is minor of 2 it calls the endMatch, else calls the NextTurn
        Parameters:
        playerID - the ID of the disconnected player

      • setPlayerReconnect

        private void setPlayerReconnect(int playerID)
        method that send to the model that the player, having the indicated ID, reconnected from the game and decrease the number of disconnected players by one
        Parameters:
        playerID - he ID of the reconnected player

      • singlePlayerTurn

        private void singlePlayerTurn()
        method starts the turn of single-player mode, if turn is the last plus one calls the endRound method

      • startTurn

        private void startTurn()
        method starts the turn of multi-player mode, if turn is the last plus one calls the endRound method else calls the startChose method on virtual view of the player that has to play

      • calculatePlayerTurn

                                int numberOfPlayers)
        method that calculate the id of the player that has to play in the specified turn using the number of players that are playing the game
        Parameters:
        turn - current turn
        numberOfPlayers - number of players that are playing the game

      • nextTurn

        void nextTurn()
        method that increase the turn by one and calls the startTurn method if multi-player mode, else singlePlayerTurn method

        Parameters:

      • endRound

        private void endRound()
        method that increase the round by one and calls the endMatch method if the game finish else calls the startTurn method setting the turn to zero

        private void checkCost(VirtualView view,
                       int indexTool)
        method use only in multi-player mode that checks if the tokens of the player are enough to use the selected tool card
        Parameters:
        view - the virtual view corresponding to the client that has chosen to use tool card
        indexTool - the chosen tool card

      • stepController

        private void stepController(VirtualView view,
                            int step)
        method that manage the step on the turn using nextStepTool method and nextStepMove method
        Parameters:
        view - the virtual view corresponding to the client that have to do next step
        step - current step

      • checkDice

        private void checkDice(VirtualView view,
                       int indexTool,
                       int indexPool)
        method used only in single-player mode that checks if the dice selected by the player is of the same color of the selected tool card using model
        Parameters:
        view - the virtual view corresponding to the client that has chosen to use tool card
        indexTool - the chosen tool card
        indexPool - the index of the draft pool corresponding to the selected dice

      • handlingDisconnection

        private void handlingDisconnection(int id,
                                   VirtualView virtualView)
        method that manage the disconnection of the client on the basis of the current game moment, handle also the case of the player doesn't set name or doesn't chose pattern card or both
        Parameters:
        virtualView - the virtual view corresponds to the disconnected client
        id - the id corresponds to the disconnect player

      • handlingReconnection

        private void handlingReconnection(VirtualView view)
        method that manage the reconnection of the client linking the new virtual view with that one previously disconnected
        Parameters:
        view - the virtual view corresponding to the reconnected client

      • sendExitNotification

        private void sendExitNotification(int iD)
        method that send to the model the id of the player that has decided to exit from the game
        Parameters:
        iD - iD of the player that has decided to exit from the game

      • sendReconnectNotification

        private void sendReconnectNotification(int iD)
        method that send to the model the id of the player that has decided to reconnect to the game after to be exited
        Parameters:
        iD - iD of the player that has decided reconnect to the game

      • startTimer

        protected void startTimer()
        method responsible of starting the timer of the player's turn and let the player TIMERTURN seconds to do the move, after that switch to the next turn ignoring the current player

        method that stop the timer if there's one currently running
